title: Beginner English 101
headline: In this free online course, you will learn the basics of English, from the verb “to be” to greetings and short phrases.
description: This English course is for those wanting to learn one of the most popular languages globally and includes teaching pronunciation, grammar, and vocabulary. Over 1.5 billion people speak English, the official language of 67 countries. This entry-level course contains modules on the alphabet, everyday verbs, and helpful vocabulary. By the end of this course, you will be able to talk about your job, greet new people, and introduce yourself.
courseDescription:
This free online course is for those starting out learning English. This course has been divided into three parts: pronunciation, grammar, and vocabulary. First, you will learn the alphabet. This section of the course includes audio files to help you pronounce the letters correctly. There is also information about special types of letters and the differences between British English and American English.

Once you know how to pronounce the alphabet correctly and practice the included questions, you will learn about articles and the verb “to be,” the most common verb in English. In this part of the course, you will also learn about nouns, pronouns, and jobs. The last section of the course will teach you essential vocabulary for greeting people, such as “hello” and “how are you.” By the end of the course, you will be able to have a short conversation.

This English course is perfect for students with little English knowledge or anyone wanting to review the basics. The topics include many audio examples from native speakers to help you learn, and there are questions in each part to check your progress. Enroll in it now to start speaking English today.
